name: French 75
description: The French 75 is a Parisian cocktail first served during World War 1, renowned for having "Such a kick it felt like being shelled by a field gun."
directions: Combine gin, syrup and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Champagne glass.
Top up with Champagne and stir gently.
